title: Piano Machine | Dev Journal
subtitle: Let's try not to use Houdini this time.

p: I started the day looking for sound fxs, I try to *'attack'* the project from different angles so I don't get borred of digging all the time on the same task.
Now I need to know how MIDI works, I'm planning to rig the keyboards so they react to the Midi file.
I started figuire out the *felt* material.

logs.p: Moving the camera around, placing some lights, see what I can get.
